contents.contents:
Permission to use, reproduce, display and distribute the listed typefaces
is hereby granted, provided that the Adobe Copyright notice appears in all
whole and partial copies of the software and that the following trademark
symbol and attribution appear in all unmodified copies of the software:

The Adobe typefaces (Type 1 font program, bitmaps and Adobe Font Metric
files) donated are:

        Utopia Regular
        Utopia Italic
        Utopia Bold
        Utopia Bold Italic

Permission to use, reproduce, display and distribute the listed typefaces is hereby granted, provided that the Adobe Copyright notice appears in all whole and partial copies of the software and that the following trademark symbol and attribution appear in all unmodified copies of the software:

The Adobe typefaces (Type 1 font program, bitmaps and Adobe Font Metric files) donated are:

Utopia Regular
Utopia Italic
Utopia Bold
Utopia Bold Italic
